strategies.name: 000N0N0 Sequencebot
Strict Odd Reversal (10/12)
strategies.prompt: trade even, if the last 10 digits are odd, then the 12th odd

strategies.name: Strict Odd Reversal V2
strategies.prompt: Wait for 10 consecutive odd digits (1-10), ignore 11th, 12th must be odd, ignore 13th, trigger on 14th odd, trade ODD
